content.html: So QEII has passed and suddenly they find it in their hearts to let people sleep on trains. Why? Because they’re the undeserving poor. The deserving poor though? Those bastards can sleep in the rain and fight for scraps till they’re ready to work.
content.value:
So QEII has passed and suddenly they find it in their hearts to let people sleep on trains. Why? Because they’re the undeserving poor.

The deserving poor though? Those bastards can sleep in the rain and fight for scraps till they’re ready to work.
